name: Viral Escapades
description:
Viral Escapades, as a new born virus will you leave the safety of the corrupted zone to collect the data crystals needed to escape the system.

My first completed project. With only about a month into learning the engine and game dev as a whole, not bad for a dad in his thirties with no time on his hands. I even did the art and music.

I had hoped for it to have more but I am still happy with what I got. Controls are a little wonky and its only got one level. but for a prototype I'm happy with it.

I'm probably gonna have to rebuild form the ground up to make it what I want it to be but I'm pretty sure I can do that. At the very least I will get it to where I thought I could take it at the beginning of the jam.

Thanks for playing.
